TopicTitle: Star Citizen Idris-M Class Frigate with 4 Hornets & Utility Ship

Articles.Content:
This is a working replica of the Star Citizen ship Aegis Dynamics Idris-M Class Frigate. It includes four Anvil F7A Hornets and a Utility/Rescue Ship. The Idris also has 24 escape pods.

Replace the Lack Luster Labs 1x1 nuclear engine & rcs config files with the ones provided. It adds the new effects and ups their power and Isp.

Imugr Album: http://imgur.com/a/bpq63


Get the craft: http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/224311-aegis-dynamics-idris-m-class-frigate-from-star

Lack Luster Labs: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24906-WIP-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-LLL-12-2-10MAY2014-SXT-16-5-28JUN2014-KSC-v2

B9: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25241-0-22-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

Hybrid Ion Engine Pack: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/31286-0-22-Ion-Hybrid-Electric-Pack-30-08-13-Soon-FKSP!!!-See-Development-Monitor

BD Armory: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...-angles)-Aug-3

Nice!

One thing I worry about those multi-man ships in Star Citizen is how to the ships operating optimally when players are logging on and off? They probably need several friends to be online all at once for 2-3 hours to do anything useful. Which I imagine would be pretty hard without a dedicated clan or something. The bigger and cooler the ship, the harder it will be to keep it running as well.

I think they said the Idris has minimum 10 human crew. I guess you would logout by grabbing a bed and going to sleep, while an NPC took over your role on the ship. Perhaps you will only need one real person for every ship lol.
